And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>1696</S> unto the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto them, When a man<S>376</S> shall make a singular<S>6381</S> vow<S>5088</S>, the persons<S>5315</S> shall be for the LORD<S>3068</S> by thy estimation<S>6187</S>.
And thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be of the male<S>2145</S> from twenty<S>6242</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> even unto sixty<S>8346</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>, even thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be fifty<S>2572</S> shekels<S>8255</S> of silver<S>3701</S>, after the shekel<S>8255</S> of the sanctuary<S>6944</S>.
And if it be a female<S>5347</S>, then thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be thirty<S>7970</S> shekels<S>8255</S>.
And if it be from five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> even unto twenty<S>6242</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>, then thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be of the male<S>2145</S> twenty<S>6242</S> shekels<S>8255</S>, and for the female<S>5347</S> ten<S>6235</S> shekels<S>8255</S>.
And if it be from a month<S>2320</S> old<S>1121</S> even unto five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S>, then thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be of the male<S>2145</S> five<S>2568</S> shekels<S>8255</S> of silver<S>3701</S>, and for the female<S>5347</S> thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be three<S>7969</S> shekels<S>8255</S> of silver<S>3701</S>.
And if it be from sixty<S>8346</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> and above<S>4605</S>; if it be a male<S>2145</S>, then thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be fifteen<S>2568</S> <S>6240</S> shekels<S>8255</S>, and for the female<S>5347</S> ten<S>6235</S> shekels<S>8255</S>.
But if he be poorer<S>4134</S> than thy estimation<S>6187</S>, then he shall present<S>5975</S> himself before<S>6440</S> the priest<S>3548</S>, and the priest<S>3548</S> shall value<S>6186</S> him; according to<S>6310</S> his ability<S>3027</S> <S>5381</S> that vowed<S>5087</S> shall the priest<S>3548</S> value<S>6186</S> him.
And if it be a beast<S>929</S>, whereof men bring<S>7126</S> an offering<S>7133</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, all that any man giveth<S>5414</S> of such unto the LORD<S>3068</S> shall be holy<S>6944</S>.
He shall not alter<S>2498</S> it, nor change<S>4171</S> it, a good<S>2896</S> for a bad<S>7451</S>, or a bad<S>7451</S> for a good<S>2896</S>: and if he shall at all<S>4171</S> change<S>4171</S> beast<S>929</S> for beast<S>929</S>, then it and the exchange<S>8545</S> thereof shall be holy<S>6944</S>.
And if it be any unclean<S>2931</S> beast<S>929</S>, of which they do not offer<S>7126</S> a sacrifice<S>7133</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, then he shall present<S>5975</S> the beast<S>929</S> before<S>6440</S> the priest<S>3548</S>:
And the priest<S>3548</S> shall value<S>6186</S> it, whether<S>996</S> it be good<S>2896</S> or<S>996</S> bad<S>7451</S>: as thou valuest<S>6187</S> it, who art the priest<S>3548</S>, so shall it be. <sup>as: Heb. according to thy estimation, O priest, etc</sup>
But if he will at all<S>1350</S> redeem<S>1350</S> it, then he shall add<S>3254</S> a fifth<S>2549</S> part thereof unto thy estimation<S>6187</S>.
And when a man<S>376</S> shall sanctify<S>6942</S> his house<S>1004</S> to be holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, then the priest<S>3548</S> shall estimate<S>6186</S> it, whether it be good<S>2896</S> or bad<S>7451</S>: as the priest<S>3548</S> shall estimate<S>6186</S> it, so shall it stand<S>6965</S>.
And if he that sanctified<S>6942</S> it will redeem<S>1350</S> his house<S>1004</S>, then he shall add<S>3254</S> the fifth<S>2549</S> part of the money<S>3701</S> of thy estimation<S>6187</S> unto it, and it shall be his.
And if a man<S>376</S> shall sanctify<S>6942</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> some part of a field<S>7704</S> of his possession<S>272</S>, then thy estimation<S>6187</S> shall be according<S>6310</S> to the seed<S>2233</S> thereof: an homer<S>2563</S> of barley<S>8184</S> seed<S>2233</S> shall be valued at fifty<S>2572</S> shekels<S>8255</S> of silver<S>3701</S>. <sup>an: or, the land of an homer, etc</sup>
If he sanctify<S>6942</S> his field<S>7704</S> from the year<S>8141</S> of jubile<S>3104</S>, according to thy estimation<S>6187</S> it shall stand<S>6965</S>.
But if he sanctify<S>6942</S> his field<S>7704</S> after<S>310</S> the jubile<S>3104</S>, then the priest<S>3548</S> shall reckon<S>2803</S> unto him the money<S>3701</S> according to<S>6310</S> the years<S>8141</S> that remain<S>3498</S>, even unto the year<S>8141</S> of the jubile<S>3104</S>, and it shall be abated<S>1639</S> from thy estimation<S>6187</S>.
And if he that sanctified<S>6942</S> the field<S>7704</S> will in any wise<S>1350</S> redeem<S>1350</S> it, then he shall add<S>3254</S> the fifth<S>2549</S> part of the money<S>3701</S> of thy estimation<S>6187</S> unto it, and it shall be assured<S>6965</S> to him.
And if he will not redeem<S>1350</S> the field<S>7704</S>, or if he have sold<S>4376</S> the field<S>7704</S> to another<S>312</S> man<S>376</S>, it shall not be redeemed<S>1350</S> any more.
But the field<S>7704</S>, when it goeth out<S>3318</S> in the jubile<S>3104</S>, shall be holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, as a field<S>7704</S> devoted<S>2764</S>; the possession<S>272</S> thereof shall be the priest's<S>3548</S>.
And if a man sanctify<S>6942</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> a field<S>7704</S> which he hath bought<S>4736</S>, which is not of the fields<S>7704</S> of his possession<S>272</S>;
Then the priest<S>3548</S> shall reckon<S>2803</S> unto him the worth<S>4373</S> of thy estimation<S>6187</S>, even unto the year<S>8141</S> of the jubile<S>3104</S>: and he shall give<S>5414</S> thine estimation<S>6187</S> in that day<S>3117</S>, as a holy thing<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
In the year<S>8141</S> of the jubile<S>3104</S> the field<S>7704</S> shall return<S>7725</S> unto him of whom it was bought<S>7069</S>, even to him to whom the possession<S>272</S> of the land<S>776</S> did belong.
And all thy estimations<S>6187</S> shall be according to the shekel<S>8255</S> of the sanctuary<S>6944</S>: twenty<S>6242</S> gerahs<S>1626</S> shall be the shekel<S>8255</S>.
Only the firstling<S>1060</S> of the beasts<S>929</S>, which should be the LORD'S<S>3068</S> firstling<S>1069</S>, no man<S>376</S> shall sanctify<S>6942</S> it; whether it be ox<S>7794</S>, or sheep<S>7716</S>: it is the LORD'S<S>3068</S>. <sup>firstling of: Heb. firstborn, etc</sup>
And if it be of an unclean<S>2931</S> beast<S>929</S>, then he shall redeem<S>6299</S> it according to thine estimation<S>6187</S>, and shall add<S>3254</S> a fifth<S>2549</S> part of it thereto: or if it be not redeemed<S>1350</S>, then it shall be sold<S>4376</S> according to thy estimation<S>6187</S>.
Notwithstanding no devoted thing<S>2764</S>, that a man<S>376</S> shall devote<S>2763</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> of all that he hath, both of man<S>120</S> and beast<S>929</S>, and of the field<S>7704</S> of his possession<S>272</S>, shall be sold<S>4376</S> or redeemed<S>1350</S>: every devoted thing<S>2764</S> is most<S>6944</S> holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
None devoted<S>2764</S>, which shall be<S>3808</S> devoted<S>2763</S> of men<S>120</S>, shall be redeemed<S>6299</S>; but shall surely<S>4191</S> be put to death<S>4191</S>.
And all the tithe<S>4643</S> of the land<S>776</S>, whether of the seed<S>2233</S> of the land<S>776</S>, or of the fruit<S>6529</S> of the tree<S>6086</S>, is the LORD'S<S>3068</S>: it is holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And if a man<S>376</S> will at all<S>1350</S> redeem<S>1350</S> ought of his tithes<S>4643</S>, he shall add<S>3254</S> thereto the fifth<S>2549</S> part thereof.
And concerning the tithe<S>4643</S> of the herd<S>1241</S>, or of the flock<S>6629</S>, even of whatsoever passeth<S>5674</S> under the rod<S>7626</S>, the tenth<S>6224</S> shall be holy<S>6944</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
He shall not search<S>1239</S> whether it be good<S>2896</S> or bad<S>7451</S>, neither shall he change<S>4171</S> it: and if he change<S>4171</S> it at all<S>4171</S>, then both it and the change<S>8545</S> thereof shall be holy<S>6944</S>; it shall not be redeemed<S>1350</S>.
These are the commandments<S>4687</S>, which the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S> for the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> in mount<S>2022</S> Sinai<S>5514</S>.
